## Source: ossf-package-analysis (a6bfa977d2643486a81b788470c6fb71063ec868d37982d1e875a8b4e0bc4e7e)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'lime-web-component-interfaces' @ 1.0.1 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:
- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
